00013 def generateNameT(name, time):
00014     """Returns a filename based on the name and time step passed in.
00015 
00016     The resulting name obeys the 8.3 DOS style format. The time step
00017     will be added to the end of the filename and be prepended by 0's if
00018     needed.
00019 
00020     The time step normally ranges from [1, nrTimeSteps].
00021     The length of the name should be max 8 characters to leave room for
00022     the time step.
00023 
00024     The name passed in may contain a directory name.
00025 
00026     See also: generateNameS(), generateNameST()
00027     """
00028     head, tail = os.path.split(name)
00029 
00030     if re.search("\.", tail):
00031       msg = "File extension given in '" + name + "' not allowed"
00032       raise FrameworkError(msg)
00033 
00034     if len(tail) == 0:
00035       msg = "No filename specified"
00036       raise FrameworkError(msg)
00037 
00038     if len(tail) > 8:
00039       msg = "Filename '" + name + "' must be shorter than 8 characters"
00040       raise FrameworkError(msg)
00041 
00042     if time < 0:
00043       msg = "Timestep must be larger than 0"
00044       raise FrameworkError(msg)
00045 
00046     nr = "%d" % (time)
00047 
00048     space = 11 - (len(tail) + len(nr))
00049     assert space >= 0
00050 
00051     result = "%s%s%s" % (tail, space * "0", nr)
00052     result = "%s.%s" % (result[:8], result[8:])
00053     assert len(result) == 12
00054 
00055     return os.path.join(head, result)
00056 
00057 
00058 def generateNameS(name, sample):
00059   """Returns a filename based on the name and sample number passed in.
00060 
00061   The resulting name contains a directory and a filename part. The
00062   sample number is used as the directory name and the name is used as
00063   the filename.
00064 
00065   The sample number normally ranges from [1, nrSamples].
00066 
00067   See also: generateNameT(), generateNameST()
00068   """
00069   return os.path.join("%d" % (sample), name)
00070 
00071 
00072 
00073 def generateNameST(name, sample, timestep):
00074   """Returns a filename based on the name, sample number and time step.
00075 
00076   See also: generateNameT(), generateNameS()
00077   """
00078   return generateNameS(generateNameT(name, timestep), sample)

00132   def _atStartOfTimeStep(self, step):
00133     self._userModel()._setInTimeStep(True)
00134     if not self._quiet():
00135       if not self._trace():
00136         msg = u"."
00137       else:
00138         msg = u"%s<time step=\"%s\">\n" % (self._indentLevel(), step)
00139       sys.stdout.write(msg)
00140       sys.stdout.flush()

00143     self._userModel()._setInTimeStep(False)
00144 
00145     if not self._quiet():
00146       if self._trace():
00147         self.showMessage("%s</time>" % (self._indentLevel()))

00150   def _atStartOfScript(self):
00151     if not self._d_inScript:
00152       self._userModel()._d_inScript = True
00153       if not self._quiet():
00154         if self._trace():
00155           self.showMessage("<script>")

00157   def _atEndOfScript(self):
00158     if self._d_inScript:
00159       self._d_inScript = False
00160       if not self._quiet():
00161         if not self._trace():
00162           msg = u"\n"
00163         else:
00164           msg = u"</script>\n"
00165         # showMessage does not work due to encode throw
00166         sys.stdout.write(msg)
00167         sys.stdout.flush()

00238   def _atStartOfSample(self, nr):
00239 
00240     self._userModel()._d_inSample = True
00241 
00242     if not self._quiet():
00243       if not self._trace():
00244         msg = u"%d " % (nr)
00245       else:
00246         msg = u"%s<sample nr=\"%s\">\n" % (self._indentLevel(), nr)
00247       # no showMessage here, \n not desired in non-trace "..." timestep output
00248       sys.stdout.write(msg)
00249       sys.stdout.flush()

00283   def _runInitial(self):
00284     self._userModel()._setInInitial(True)
00285     if(hasattr(self._userModel(), 'initial')):
00286       self._incrementIndentLevel()
00287       self._traceIn("initial")
00288       self._userModel().initial()
00289       self._traceOut("initial")
00290       self._decrementIndentLevel()
00291 
00292     self._userModel()._setInInitial(False)
00293 
00294   def _runDynamic(self):
00295     self._userModel()._setInDynamic(True)
00296     step = self._userModel().firstTimeStep()
00297     while step <= self._userModel().nrTimeSteps():
00298 
00299       self._incrementIndentLevel()
00300       self._atStartOfTimeStep(step)
00301       self._userModel()._setCurrentTimeStep(step)
00302       if hasattr(self._userModel(), 'dynamic'):
00303         self._incrementIndentLevel()
00304         self._traceIn("dynamic")
00305         self._userModel().dynamic()
00306         self._traceOut("dynamic")
00307         self._decrementIndentLevel()
00308 
00309       self._timeStepFinished()
00310       self._decrementIndentLevel()
00311       step += 1
00312 
00313     self._userModel()._setInDynamic(False)

00369   def _generateName(self, name):
00370     """Returns a filename based on the name and the current sample number and time step.
00371 
00372     The filename created will depend on whether this function is called
00373     from within a sample and/or a time step. Pseudo code:
00374 
00375     if sample and time step:
00376       sample/name.timestep
00377     else if sample:
00378       sample/name
00379     else if time step:
00380       name.timestep
00381     else:
00382       name
00383 
00384     If this function is not called from within a time step and name does not
00385     have an extension, the default extension '.map' is added to the name.
00386 
00387     See also: generateNameS(), generateNameT(), generateNameST()
00388     """
00389 
00390     if self._inSample() and self._inTimeStep():
00391       name = self._generateNameST(name, self.currentSampleNumber(), self.currentTimeStep())
00392     elif self.inSample():
00393       name = self._generateNameS(name, self.currentSampleNumber())
00394     elif self.inTimeStep():
00395       name = self._generateNameT(name, self.currentTimeStep())
00396 
00397     if not self.inTimeStep() and len(os.path.splitext(name)[1]) == 0:
00398       name = name + ".map"
00399 
00400     return name
00401

00413   def _generateNameST(self, name, sample, time):
00414     """Returns a filename based on the name, sample number and time step.
00415 
00416     See also: generateNameT(), generateNameS()
00417     """
00418     return self._generateNameS(self._generateNameT(name, time), sample)

00420   def generateNameS(self, name, sample):
00421     return generateNameS(name, sample)

00424   def _reportNew(self, variable, name, style=1):
00425     head, tail = os.path.split(name)
00426 
00427     if re.search("\.", tail):
00428       msg = "File extension given in '" + name + "' not allowed, provide filename without extension"
00429       raise FrameworkError(msg)
00430 
00431 
00432     directoryPrefix = ""
00433     nameSuffix = ".map"
00434     newName = ""
00435 
00436     if hasattr(self._userModel(), "_inStochastic"):
00437       if self._userModel()._inStochastic():
00438         if self._userModel()._inPremc():
00439           newName = name + nameSuffix
00440         elif self._userModel()._inPostmc():
00441           newName = name + nameSuffix
00442         else:
00443           directoryPrefix = str(self._userModel().currentSampleNumber())
00444 
00445     if self._userModel()._inInitial():
00446       newName = name + nameSuffix
00447 
00448     if hasattr(self._userModel(), "_inDynamic"):
00449       if self._userModel()._inDynamic() or self._inUpdateWeight():
00450         newName = generateNameT(name, self._userModel().currentTimeStep())
00451 
00452     path = os.path.join(directoryPrefix, newName)
00453     import PCRaster
00454     PCRaster.report(variable, path)
00455

00458   def _readmapNew(self, name, style=1):
00459     directoryPrefix = ""
00460     nameSuffix = ".map"
00461     newName = ""
00462 
00463 
00464     if hasattr(self._userModel(), "_inStochastic"):
00465       if self._userModel()._inStochastic():
00466         if self._userModel()._inPremc() or self._userModel()._inPostmc():
00467           newName = name + nameSuffix
00468         else:
00469           directoryPrefix = str(self._userModel().currentSampleNumber())
00470 
00471     if hasattr(self._userModel(), "_inInitial"):
00472       if self._userModel()._inInitial():
00473         newName = name + nameSuffix
00474 
00475     if self._inResume():
00476       timestep = self._userModel().firstTimeStep()
00477       newName = generateNameT(name, timestep - 1)
00478 
00479     if hasattr(self._userModel(), "_inDynamic"):
00480       if self._userModel()._inDynamic() or self._inUpdateWeight():
00481         timestep = self._userModel().currentTimeStep()
00482         newName = generateNameT(name, timestep)
00483 
00484     path = os.path.join(directoryPrefix, newName)
00485     assert path is not ""
00486     import PCRaster
00487     return PCRaster.readmap(path)

00494 class FrameworkError(Exception):
00495   def __init__(self, msg):
00496     self._msg = msg
00497 
00498   def __str__(self):
00499     return self._msg
